CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-13 14:06
Subject: A look back at our Group Seminar
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/86d406071e64f27508ea1ed07b3088332112241825.png> 	

Our Annual Group Seminar, “Symphony of the Future,” brought together inspiring voices, transformative ideas, and unforgettable moments. From celebrating 70 years of legacy to envisioning a bold and sustainable future, every session reminded us of the power of unity, innovation, and inclusion.

Together, we’ve orchestrated a vision for the future—one that harmonizes our past, present, and tomorrow.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/7409f0a7eb0c8806e3095d7a906d6726140438089.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=454&user=10620> 	

Re-watch all of our sessions here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=454&user=10620> 


P <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=454&user=10620> lease note that these videos are for internal use only. If you wish to share externally, please reach out to Internal Comms. 










View snaps from the UAE here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=455&user=10620>
